long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unleash your creativity with the Random Color Palette Generator! This sleek and intuitive Chrome extension empowers designers, artists, and color enthusiasts to effortlessly generate stunning and unique color palettes for their projects.

Feeling stuck with finding the right color combination? Let our extension do the work for you! With just a click of a button, you can generate a beautiful array of random colors, ranging from vibrant hues to subtle pastels.

Features:

Instantly generate random color palettes with adjustable color count.
Each color palette comes with HEX codes for easy copy-pasting.
The palette's central HEX color is displayed for quick reference.
Color boxes have adaptive text colors to ensure readability.
Intuitive and user-friendly interface for a seamless experience.
Whether you're designing a website, crafting captivating illustrations, or simply exploring new color schemes, this extension is a valuable tool to spark your creative imagination. Say goodbye to color-block moments and unleash a world of possibilities with the Random Color Palette Generator.

Install now and dive into a world of color inspiration!
